column4: hi all  i have a problem (Error mounting: mount exited with exit code 21: mount: according to mtab, /dev/sda2 is already mounted on /media/SYSTEM RESERVED
)does it sound something familiar to someone?
yes; the partition is already mounted
i remember elling you that the problem is that what you are tryong to mount is *already* mounted. you can see te contents in "/media/SYSTEM RESERVED"
